key.name: font
key.description: The font that the status bar will use. Should be monospace and a Nerd font

key.name: time-block
key.summary: Show the current system time and date in the status bar
key.description: Show the current system time and date in the status bar, This block will no be updated longer appear in the status bar if set to false

key.name: time-fmt
key.summary: The time format of the clock component

key.name: date-fmt
key.summary: The date format of the date component

key.name: update-time-ntp
key.summary: Automatically update the system time with ntp
key.description: When connman reports it's status to be ready or online, the bar will attempt to update the system time

key.name: brightness-block
key.summary: Show the current brightness in the status bar
key.description: Show the current backlight brightness in the status bar, This block will no be updated or appear in the status bar if set to false

key.name: battery-block
key.summary: Show the current battery level in the status bar
key.description: Show the current battery level in the status bar, This block will no be updated or appear in the status bar if set to false

key.name: connman-block
key.summary: Show the current WiFi connection in the status bar
key.description: Show the current WiFi connection in the status bar, This block will no be updated or appear in the status bar if set to false

key.name: media-block
key.summary: Show the currently playing media in the status bar
key.description: Show the currently playing media in the status bar, This block will no be updated or appear in the status bar if set to false

key.name: color-inactive
key.summary: Status bar color when monitor is not active
key.description: Changes the color of the status bar when the monitor it resides on does not have a window in focus.

key.name: color-active
key.summary: Status bar color when monitor is active
key.description: Changes the color of the status bar when the monitor it resides on has a window in focus.

key.name: time-servers
key.description: NTP time servers to use to update time if update-time-ntp is enabled and time-block is also enabled. These servers must use the NTP protocol.

key.name: top-bar
key.summary: Places the bar at the top of the screen
key.description: Places the bar at the top of the screen if true, and at the bottom if false.

key.name: bar-show-time
key.summary: How long to show the bar when the volume or brightness button is pressed
key.description: How long to show the bar when it is shown instead of the status bar. This should be in milliseconds
